items.title: Nigeria pardons activist Ken Saro-Wiwa 30 years after execution
items.description: The deaths of the environmentalist and eight other campaigners sparked an global outcry in 1995.

items.title: 'I walked out of rubble': Survivor on how he escaped Air India wreckage
items.description: Mr Ramesh said he saw cabin crew members and passengers dying in front of his eyes.

items.title: Watch: Israel strikes targets across Iran as leaders vow to fight
items.description: Israel's prime minister said Iran's nuclear capability posed a "clear and present danger", while Iran's president promised a "powerful" response.

items.title: Major music festival pulls out of Serbia after backing student protests
items.description: The organisers have blamed 'undemocratic pressures' after authorities cut off funding.

items.title: Who are the victims of the Air India plane crash?
items.description: Details are still emerging, but these are the people so far confirmed by the BBC to have died.
